website_summaries.verdict: This is a reliable lint roller that easily diminishes pet hair, lint, and other debris from myriad fabrics.
pros: Extreme stickiness of these lint-rolling sheets means that this roller lasts a long time
Picks up debris well, particularly pet hair off of clothing
It reliably removes lint in less passes than competing lint rollers
cons: It can sometimes be tough to separate one layer of sheets from the next

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware picture does NOT reflect actual product
customer_reviews.text: I love Evercare products, because they get rid of lint. However, the picture of the giant lint roller in the listing is different from what I received. While I was expecting the lint roller with a curvy handle (as pictured), instead I received a slim/straight handle lint roller. The design I received has a tendency to snag clothes or pull thread if the head of the lint roller comes in contact with the clothes. I feel the product picture is misleading and should be updated. Please see my picture for the actual product you will receive.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and two beagles so obviously there is a pet hair issue for my clothing since I never deny a hug to my sweeties! This roller works very well and I keep it handy for quick touch ups before leaving the house. Works to touch up the couch and car seats too. I purchase refills as of course the handle holds up to long term use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Paine

customer_reviews.title: Dry cleaner uses this.
customer_reviews.text: I was dropping g off a u inform at my local dry cleaner. The woman ahead of me had a dog hair coveted pant suit that she was dropping off. She grabbed the roller and started to do a quick roll. Hair-be-gone!!! I asked what kind that was and was told they were It sold to dry cleaners. So, I peeked the name on the roller. Amazon had it. She is a LIAR!!! I ordered one. It's super sticky and is made of strong sheets. This thing is fantastic. I will only buy these from now on. I gave my store bought lint rollers to my ex husband.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaHugNKiss

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 2 stars because I love the size of the handle and sheet, but the hubby does not like this at all. We have one (1) Maine Coon cat, she's beautiful and very long haired. She likes to sit on our bed and lay atop our clothing after we put it out. My husband's uniform is navy, most mornings I have to remove Pepper (cat) and her hair from his clothing. This does not get it up in one forward roll, I have to go over it several times, but the sheet does not stick after one complete roll over and back. Also, trying to get Pepper's hair off of black clothing, I use about 3 sheets. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CemeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The best way to de-fur
customer_reviews.text: If you have a longhaired pet and have been "furred", you need to have one or more of these around. They remove all hair from every surface I tried, from various clothing to upholstery, with minimal effort. Some reviewers find each tape sheet difficult to remove to expose a fresh sheet, but I did not have that problem, even though I have essentially no fingernails to use. And this brand does seem stickier than other brands, such as 3M. Time to de-fur (no pun intended, though it's hard to resist).
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Need stock in these!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 golden retrievers, so the hair is plentiful!! I lint roll everything and this is the only brand I use, because others don’t have enough stick like these do!!
customer_reviews.author: M Coop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at picking up pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about a week and am very pleased with its performance. Frankly, it’s one of the best I’ve used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The tape quality is good and it's nice to have around for pet hair and lint from clothes and upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without these things! I have a VERY heavy shedding German Shepherd, two Poms, a Persian cat, and a tuxedo rescue cat who seems to get his short black fur everywhere! These are the best lint rollers you will find! If you have pets that shed, BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: ThePoolFloatQueenTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Stickier than most
customer_reviews.text: Super sticky, which we need with 2 cats and a dog who are shedding in the spring. Plus my kids wear mostly under armour shirts and they're really staticky so we keep one of these in the car, one in the living room, one in the laundry area.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T. Cookson

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a white cat. And where white cars go, fur inevitably coats everything. I'm not sure what it is about this cat's fur, but it seems impervious to most attempts to remove it. I'm not sure if this brand is tackier or if the slightly larger size gives it a better surface area - but it's the most effective cat hair remover I've found to date. I keep one in the car, one in my office and several around the house.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Amazing on pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a gift, didn’t know it existed. It clearly is superior to other lint rollers. Very sticky and takes off cat hair like you wouldn’t believe. I immediately ordered more of them, don’t want to be out. .
customer_reviews.author: Owl 2020

customer_reviews.title: The stickiest!
customer_reviews.text: We have dogs and cats and fur everywhere! As far as sticky rollers go, these are the best because they have more "stick" to them than the others I've tried. The Scotch brand is the other one we use when we can't find these, but we probably use 3 of those to 1 of these to accomplish the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: PT Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Love it, will buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few varieties of rollers. Really love this one. I didn't realize how much a difference a large barrel would make. It's awesome. Just the right amount of stick. We have a very hairy cat, so this is a very helpful remedy for not looking like 'crazy cat people'. Highly recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This roller works so much better than the smaller ones. It picks up the hair very quickly with minimal swipes of the roller. I am very happy with this product and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The only lint rollers that actually remove golden retriever hair
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. A couple of sheets of THIS lint roller removes more cat and dog hair than half a roll of the ubiquitous and less expensive competitor's brand. I had almost give up on sticky tape lint rollers to remove my golden's hair from my cloths (and car seats) until I discovered THIS brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Best Roller Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siberian Husky at home so I have alot of dog hair and this is the BEST roller ever! Super sticky and the paper is thick and high quality - I have used alot of different rollers and this one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the blue one from WM This thing really grabs the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Moerygar65

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little bigger, considering the "giant" marketing name, but that just means I'll have to wait for the steamroller size. They might have to team up with Caterpillar to release that one.
customer_reviews.author: elreydelfin

customer_reviews.title: Relief for the human fur magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Great fur removal! I go to my friends house who has five cats and two dogs and I come home covered in fur. Which spreads to everything I own and looks like I own animals. But this baby does a great job of removing all that fur from my clothes! Thank You Evercare!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: A lesson in the realities of the human condition
customer_reviews.text: Nothing will ever get cat hair out of your clothes, but this is as good as it comes, I guess. Reduce your shame at social gatherings; pretend you have control over your life.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Might be frustrating for the first few sheets, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super sticky, sturdy roller and overall a great product. My only issue is that when you are going through the first dozen sheets or so, they're kind of hard to pull off evenly. It's like the edges aren't cut all the way or something because no matter how careful you are at trying to lift them gently and slowly, you inevitably tear the thing in half and have a devil of a time grabbing the rogue edge. Other than that, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up cat hair off clothes
customer_reviews.text: Needed some sort of countermeasure against my roommate's cat who was leaving hair everywhere. I mean, who can turn down Mr. Kitty's kawaii meows and rubs? The lint roller does it job and my pants are now cat hair free.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Cat Hair!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. The only way to survive in a house with three cats. We have these strategically placed throughout the house. The giant size, super sticky rolls get the job done quickly. We reorder these on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: engineer_mom

customer_reviews.title: A must-have item
customer_reviews.text: If you've got dogs, cats or birds, you need this roller. Keep one in your car and the rest in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are big, sticky and what I like the best about the sheets is that they're super easy to tear off. What I don't like is returning to get more (the day I received them) to find out they went from 4 bucks to 10 bucks a roll. ouch!
customer_reviews.author: toodance

customer_reviews.title: Best One I've Had So Far
customer_reviews.text: Beware; this thing sticks and it can be annoying at times but that's because it is really good! :) I've purchased the standard ones before and this is my first time buying something other than the "standard" ones and I can say I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: handy for removing fur from clothes and cat tower
customer_reviews.text: Smaller version of the wide roller I use it for smaller areas. Roll it back over the cover sheet when you are finished to keep the next sticky sheet clean or sticking to things when you put it away.
customer_reviews.author: F. B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way these lint rollers pick up lint and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these lint rollers pick up lint and cat hair. Only problem I have is finding replacements to match the handles. My local grocery store isn't always well stocked.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Southard

customer_reviews.title: ... keep ordering it because this is one of the best sheet roller that help mE to clean my furniture ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time I order it and I guess I 'll keep ordering it because this is one of the best sheet roller that help mE to clean my furniture from my kitty cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ayelet

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lint roller that I've found. It's more powerful than the "run of the mill" lint rollers that one usually finds in the super markets and etc. These are the only ones I use now.
customer_reviews.author: bScanner

customer_reviews.title: tape is not as sticky as I would like. Does not remove all lint very easily
customer_reviews.text: tape is not as sticky as I would like. Does not remove all lint very easily. Would prefer something that has more grip to catch more of the tough to get fuzzys.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as sticky as I had hoped. There doesn't seem to be any solution for long cat hairs, which remain no matter what you do. Washing and drying is the only solution.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best. Product
customer_reviews.text: Best. Product. Ever. Seriously. We have a dog that sheds nonstop & it is a wonderful product to stay professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Soco

customer_reviews.title: It's a sticky situation.
customer_reviews.text: I love to wear dark colors, have dark furniture, 5 cats and 2 dogs, so you can imagine how much I need a good lint roller. These are very sticky and because the roll is large you don't have to tear off as often.
customer_reviews.author: Kimer801

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: NEVER HAD A ROLLER PICK UP AS THIS WINNER DOES,BETTER GET SEVERAL YOU WILL BE MORE THEN PLEASED. HAD USED IT ON PET HAIR AND IT PICKED UP LIKE A CHARM. FABULOUS STICKY PAPER WILL BUY SEVERAL AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT EINSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: By far the best lint roller I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: By far the best lint roller I have ever tried. Sheets are just the right amount of sticky, and they separate easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like to grab my cat and use directly one her. Its alot of fun. She doesn't really mind. Also i heard this is Drakes favorite brand. Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: BOB!

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye cat hair!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I don't recommend using it on cat hair until it has fallen off the cat, however. It seems that cats don't actually like that. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: forager

customer_reviews.title: Good roller, larger than standard
customer_reviews.text: Sticky roller works well - we use this for furniture, it is larger than standard sticky rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: sheets tear off easily and it's great at picking up pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Although this seems expensive for what it is, it's a huge roller, sheets tear off easily and it's great at picking up pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: KX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have four cats and two dogs... Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: smcwilcox

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepherd and a lab/aussie mix so I cannot live without several of these Giant Lint Rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Charaine

customer_reviews.title: Giant Pic-up
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly pleased with Evercare's lint rollers ... the Giant Pic-up and the regular-sized rollers. The 'sticky-ness' is far superior to the other lint rollers I've used, and therefore I won't buy any rollers but Evercare again. Because these rollers are stickier the sheets do a better job and you don't have to use additional sheets to get the pick-up job done... like running over the furniture where the cat sits and sleeps, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn morris

customer_reviews.title: Happy owner of a very fluffy cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat's fur is all over my apartment and all over my clothes. So when I saw a giant lint roller at a great price, I got it. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this from my pets shedding, it does feel up fast with hair, however there seems a never-ending supply of dog hair
customer_reviews.author: cruzer02

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but....
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, but honestly you can buy this by the case load at Costco for a fraction of the price, when they have them in stock. We totally need these (they are good and sticky) to clean off the pet hair that our very loved doggie leaves everywhere. WOOF, we recommend the product, but you would do better to buy it at warehouse place instead.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: Handy and used almost everyday. Our cat sheds quite a bit despite being combed and these are needed. The larger size works for us.
customer_reviews.author: RayBey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a must have product. My cat sheds year round. Excellent product well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: pogo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Evercare products because they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fur Catcher
customer_reviews.text: Having too cats leaves fur everywhere so these were a necessity. They are very sticky and hold a lot of fur. I highly recommend them to anyone with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Does the work!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and Does the work! These are the only too things I care about a product!
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: Home with Dogs
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without these? Way better than regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: great size but hard to get the same refill size
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble finding the refill on these so i wont buy them again. They pick dirt really well and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kulk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They work well but I now get them at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Emmart

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Every closet needs this. Instant fresh-ups and fewer visits to the dry cleaner! A great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This larger size is perfect for rolling pet hairs or lint from large areas such as couches, chairs, etc. I buy several at a time and save on shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Accord

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Nice product does pick up pet hair from furniture and clothing.
customer_reviews.author: EC Holder

customer_reviews.title: Best Lint Roller
customer_reviews.text: My cat sheds a lot; these are the best lint rollers I've used. I'd rate this product 5 stars if it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon K 25

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do and picks up cat hair. It picks up every last hair. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Lint Roller
customer_reviews.text: works well getting lint off my clothes. Not as great getting off furniture.
customer_reviews.author: smd305

customer_reviews.title: Great roller brush for pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my needs. I use for pet hair clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Spell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best roller for pet hair. I have a short haired dog that sheds a lot and it manages to pick up her hair where others have failed. Also it doesn't take as many strips to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Giant Lint Pic Up Roller..
customer_reviews.text: My black Pants pick up a lot of dog hair and the roller picks up everything. Won't eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i can never go back to using any other lint rollers.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: While these cost more than some of the competition, there is a reason. These are by far the highest quality, with the highest level of stickiness. Completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: great produt
customer_reviews.text: This product is reat at picking up dog hair. I use it all the time on my daughter`s bed. Saves me time allowing me more time todo other house chores.
customer_reviews.author: AMELIA

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It picks up lint and cat hair very well. It is exactly as I was expecting and keeps my clothes looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Cornell Law Student

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You can't ask for more in a roller and lint brush. It tears easy, cleans the hair off well, nice and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So great at removing pet hair - definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: dude... it's a lint roller
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to say about this except that... it works? Yeah, that's it really. It does what you'd expect. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: not super sticky like i'd
customer_reviews.text: nothing special about this roller at all, not super sticky like i'd hoped
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

product_meta.title: Evercare Giant Lint Roller, 60 Sheet Roll
product_meta.description: Keep your clothes, car and home furnishings looking their best with the Evercare Giant Lint Roller. Extra sticky, extra-large sheets quickly and easily pick up lint, pet hair and more. Rugged extra strong plastic handle.
feature_bullets: Use at home or on the go

specifications.Manufacturer: Phillips Feed & Pet Supply Natural Balance
